description:
reddish striped wood; "SMITH" engraved on trigger plate by flintlock; metal inlay in a wavy pattern along forearm; "C Smith Williamsburg 2001" on top of barrel between lock and rear sight; stock and neck carved and inlaid with metal in various designs. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
title: Virginia-style (Winchester, 1700s) Flintlock Longrifle
